ch0126_10_haruka/0101_0701_02_10:
I want to see just how strong we’ve gotten here
on Pasio!
ch0126_10_haruka/7101_0701_01_10: Last time I saw Brendan, we made a promise.
ch0126_10_haruka/7101_0701_02_10:
We agreed that our next Pokémon battle would be
a serious one—that we’ll go all out!
ch0126_10_haruka/7101_0701_03_10:
I figure if our battles keep heating up like that
every time we meet...
ch0126_10_haruka/7101_0701_04_10:
eventually we’ll have the fiercest, fieriest battle
the world has ever seen! Don’t you think?
ch0126_10_haruka/7102_0701_01_10:
Hey, check out my sygna suit! I can’t help but get
serious when I’m wearing this!
ch0126_10_haruka/7102_0701_02_10: It gets both my mind and body all fired up!
ch0126_10_haruka/7102_0701_03_10:
I’m sure I can keep battling alongside Blaziken
for ages in this!
ch0126_10_haruka/7103_0701_01_10:
When I’m wearing this sygna suit and standing
next to Blaziken...
ch0126_10_haruka/7103_0701_02_10:
my fighting spirit flares up inside me, and I feel
like I can stand up to any opponent, no matter
how strong!
ch0126_10_haruka/7104_0701_01_10:
Blaziken’s a Pokémon known for having great
jumping power.
ch0126_10_haruka/7104_0701_02_10:
I’m actually pretty confident in my own leg
strength as well, since I’ve walked all over
for my fieldwork.
ch0126_10_haruka/7104_0701_03_10:
I mean, I obviously can’t jump over a
building or anything, but, you know...
ch0126_10_haruka/7105_0701_01_10:
Is there anyone in particular you want to show off
to so they can see how much stronger you’ve
gotten, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0126_10_haruka/7105_0701_02_10:
As for me, I’d like to show Brendan and my dad
and Steven and...
ch0126_10_haruka/7105_0701_03_10: *giggle* Oh, there are just too many to count!
ch0126_10_haruka/1701_0701_01_10: Ehehe! I’ve got something nice for you!
ch0126_10_haruka/1701_0702_01_10: I really hope you like it!
ch0126_10_haruka/2501_0701_01_10:
Someday I hope to challenge Steven, the Hoenn
region’s Champion.
ch0126_10_haruka/2501_0701_02_10:
After all, if I get strong enough to become a
Champion, I could go just about anywhere, don’t
you think?
ch0126_10_haruka/2501_0701_03_10:
I want to keep traveling to all sorts of places to
meet more and more different Pokémon!
ch0126_10_haruka/2501_0702_01_10:
I want to travel to new and unknown destinations,
but first, I’ve gotta train up!
ch0126_10_haruka/2501_0702_02_10:
Since I want to challenge Steven, that means I’ve
gotta get waaay stronger!
ch0126_10_haruka/2511_0701_01_10:
Superstrong people like Steven and Cynthia really
stand out, even in a crowd.
ch0126_10_haruka/2511_0701_02_10:
It’s almost like they’ve got some sort of aura
around them...
ch0126_10_haruka/2511_0701_03_10:
If I keep training, do you think I’ll eventually have
an aura myself?
ch0126_10_haruka/2511_0702_01_10:
It’s definitely different from the way Blaziken burns
with its flames.
ch0126_10_haruka/2511_0702_02_10:
I wonder if there’s some sort of trick to giving off
an aura...
ch0126_10_haruka/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! Ready to get the day started?
Come on, let’s go!
ch0126_10_haruka/3003_0701_01_10:
Hey there! I was just taking a little break.
Gotta make sure my Pokémon has some time
to cool off!
ch0126_10_haruka/3005_0701_01_10:
Great work today! Let me know when you’re
heading home. We can walk together!
